column1: Local hyperthermia can treat cancer without surgery.

Different forms of energy may be used, including: - Radio waves - Microwaves - Ultrasound waves Heat may be delivered using: - An external machine to deliver heat to tumors near the surface of the body - A probe to deliver heat to tumors within a body cavity, such as the throat or rectum - A needle-like probe to sends radio wave energy directly into the tumor to kill cancer cells.
This method treats melanoma on the arms or legs, as well as lung or liver cancer.
